description:
With a Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack membership, access a collection of classic and colorful Game Boy™ Advance games to play anytime, anywhere! Shrink down for a big adventure in The Legend of Zelda™: The Minish Cap and master sibling strategies in Mario & Luigi™: Superstar Saga. Gotta take off? Pick up where you left off with suspend points.

Shrink the screen size or enable a retro-style filter to play your way. With online and local wireless multiplayer you can lap opponents in Mario Kart™: Super Circuit or battle it out in Super Mario™ Advance 4: Super Mario Bros.™ 3—no Link Cable required!

• A selection of Game Boy Advance games including The Legend of Zelda: The Minish Cap, Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3, and hidden gems like Kuru Kuru Kururin™
• Games can also be played offline, so you can play while on the go—anytime, anywhere
• Create suspend points for each game to save your progress
• Choose a smaller screen size or retro filter to play your way
• Play online or with local wireless with up to 3 friends in games like Mario Kart: Super Circuit
name: Game Boy™ Advance – Nintendo Switch Online
